title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
creator_credit: Ken Adam, Ken Hughes, Albert R. Broccoli, Dramatic Features and Warfield Productions
brief_description: James Bond author, Ian Fleming, wrote this charming story of a car that could fly. The film version is a wonderful musical/comedy fantasy for the whole family. It stars Dick Van Dyke and Gert Frobe and is recreated for the screen by the director of “Those Magnificent Men in Their Flying Machines”.
creator_credit_for_label: Ken Adam, Ken Hughes, Albert R. Broccoli, Dramatic Features and Warfield Productions
